yêu cầu nhà sản xuất tạo ra nhiều secret level nhiều hơn và tạo ra chapter 4 nhanh hơn ngay lập tức, nếu không thì đừng có làm game nữa. Với lại ông mà còn nói "Tôi là người sáng tạo nghệ thuật, bạn không thể thúc ép nghệ thuật" thì im đi nhé 😏
Hi Hi, I played the game, I liked it, bye.
Cookie1127 Wow just wow in a good way. This is an amazing game it’s fun it’s hard it annoying I looovvvveeee it🦧bro I’m addicted

Perfect Makes me question my intelligence everytime
I don’t have much to say It’s pretty cool, love the game:)
Game The real troll was all those adds

BEST TROLL GAME EVER I never thought I would say a troll game is good, but this isn’t good, it is the best. I literally started playing last night and already love it. It is fun, frustrating(in a good way), and challenging. Highly recommend this game.

Ads and why y’all are whiners People who complain about ads are dumb you say that ads are bad and that they come all the time but it’s every 2 or 3 minutes and maybe you’re getting it multiple times because you’re so bad you can’t pass the level and for the ones that say you HAVE to pay to even be able to enjoy the game I played this completely FREE all the way to the end and it was still super fun and hard at times so instead of whining just get better at games and for people who want to download this I recommend it it has a pretty good game content and you get a lot of levels 5 or 4 in each one except for two of them so yeah great game love to see more :)
Great game ads are horrible Great game, and ads are always part of games these days, but the amount and length of ads was too much — ended up uninstalling pretty fast
It good I like dark souls
DUDE ITS AWESOME Like bro you made me cry all night and I couldn’t sleep. THIS GAME IS MENT TO SUFFER. I will never sleep ever again level devil is now an adiction game 🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰🎰
